record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is nothing further to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:32 p.m., adjourned until Wednesday, January 10, 2007, at 9:30 a.m.
